meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>fly</kanji> and <kanji>go</kanji> <kanji>machine</kanji> is some machine you get into that flies and goes places. It's an <vocabulary>airplane</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
